metadata.title: CVE-2021-21417 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: fluidsynth is a software synthesizer based on the SoundFont 2 specifications. A use after free violation was discovered in fluidsynth, that can be triggered when loading an invalid SoundFont file.

criterions.comment: fluidsynth package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
